title: Web Applications With Java
summary: Java is an incredibly versatile programming language that can be used in many different environments and contexts. Java is also open source, which means that anyone can use it for free. The best developers out there who know how to work with Java are well-paid, happy individuals who love what they do. Learning how to build web applications with Java is easier than ever thanks to the many different frameworks and libraries available. The Spring Framework is, hands down, one of the most popular Java web frameworks available today.

content.compiledSource: const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...a}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...a,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("h2",null,"Spring MVC"),mdx("p",null,"The Spring Framework is, hands down, one of the most popular Java web frameworks available today. Part of that popularity is based on its history: it\u2019s been around for a long time and has a great history behind it."),mdx("p",null,"But it\u2019s also a great framework for building modern websites and applications, with all the latest and greatest frameworks and libraries built in. Spring JMS, Spring Security, and Spring Data are all part of the Spring family and can be used together, or independently, in any application."),mdx("p",null,"From the start, the Spring Framework designed itself to be modular and extensible. That means that you can start out with just the pieces that you need, and add new modules as your application grows and requires more functionality. And when you do add something new, you can be sure that it will work with the rest of your application."),mdx("h2",null,"Java Servlet and JavaServer Pages"),mdx("p",null,"Java is an incredibly versatile programming language, and one of the reasons for its success is its ability to be used in many different environments and contexts. The same Java code can be used to build desktop applications (like Windows or Mac applications), mobile apps, web applications, and much more. Java is also open source, which means that anyone can use it for free."),mdx("p",null,"Java is used to build the front end of many web applications, and JavaServer Pages (JSP) is one of the languages used to build web apps. JSP is a server-side language that allows you to create static HTML pages that are stored in a server database and are sent to the browser as plain text."),mdx("h2",null,"Struts 2 Framework"),mdx("p",null,"The open source Struts framework is designed to make developing web apps easier by providing a structured way to organize your code and make it reusable. Struts is an excellent Java web development framework for building robust web applications and is one of the first tools new developers are introduced to when learning Java."),mdx("p",null,"As with most Java frameworks, it makes use of as much open source software as possible, including Apache Commons and Apache Jakarta libraries. It also has a large online community that benefits from the collaborative nature of open source work."),mdx("p",null,"One of the best things about Struts is the fact that it\u2019s categorized as a Model-View-Controller (MVC) framework. MVC frameworks allow you to separate the different parts of your app into different sections. In this case, the model is the database, the view is the web page, and the controller is the code that manages the communication between the two."),mdx("h2",null,"Grails With Groovy"),mdx("p",null,"Grails is another Java web development framework that has been around since 2005 and is written in the Groovy language. It was designed to be an easy way to create data-driven websites and apps, and it takes full advantage of the Java platform."),mdx("p",null,"Grails was created with the intention of making it easier for developers to work with Java. It uses convention over configuration, which means that the framework uses rules and assumptions to make decisions for you, such as naming conventions, environment settings, etc. This makes configuration easy and less time-consuming."),mdx("p",null,"Grails is a powerful framework that makes it easy to build web applications and websites using Java. It supports many different databases, including Oracle, PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQL Server. It also comes with a number of built-in features that make it easy to create, maintain, and add new content to your website."),mdx("h2",null,"Conclusion"),mdx("p",null,"The Java programming language has been around for a long time, but it\u2019s still one of the most popular languages used today. And those who know how to use it best are in high demand among employers."),mdx("p",null,"That means that the best developers out there who know how to work with Java are well-paid, happy individuals who love what they do. And the great news is that learning how to build web applications with Java is easier than ever thanks to the many different frameworks and libraries available."),mdx("p",null,"We hope you\u2019ve enjoyed this article and have discovered a new library or framework that will make your life as a Java developer easier and more productive."))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: How to Get Started with Coding

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...o}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...o,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Coding is an essential skill that can be applied to a variety of roles, industries and company sizes. What started as a niche skill used by software developers is now a marketable and relevant skill for almost every industry. It has become so ubiquitous that even the Department of Labor has highlighted coding as one of the fastest growing skills in demand.
Coding is most commonly thought of as the ability to create websites, apps and software. However, there are actually many different types of coding. Computer programming (or coding) involves writing instructions for computers so they perform certain actions or functions. The type of coding you choose to learn may have different applications depending on your interests, career trajectory and personal strengths. Read on to learn more about the various types of coding, as well`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...a}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...a,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`In this digital world, everything is going digital. Even the field of programming is shifting towards more digitized platforms and solutions. In such a scenario, the need for compact programs that can be easily installed and used on any device arises. That\u2019s where Java packages come into play.
A package in java is a collection of related classes, interfaces, enumerations, and sub-packages under one umbrella. As you may have already understood from the above explanation, packages are a great way to organize your code into logical units that can be reused across projects. Packages help you avoid naming conflicts with other libraries or programs and help keep related things together so they\u2019re easier to find later on. Let\u2019s take a look at some common Java packages:`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The Most Common Coding Mistakes and How to Avoid Them

intro.compiledSource: const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...o}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...o,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,"No matter how many tutorials or articles you read, coding is always challenging. Even experienced developers sometimes make mistakes. New coders might feel like they\u2019re constantly making errors, but it\u2019s all part of the learning process. Mistakes are inevitable and beneficial as long as you learn from them. The more coding experience you have, the less frequently these mistakes will occur. However, if you\u2019re just beginning to code, it\u2019s best to know about the most common errors before they become a serious problem for your project. Read on to find out more about these coding mistakes and how to avoid them when coding your next software project."))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The Best Coding Shortcuts for Beginners

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...o}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...o,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`In the beginning, coding can feel like solving puzzles with red-hot needles in your hands. Everything is new, nothing makes sense and you can\u2019t even tell if you are on the right track or not. It feels like one confusing labyrinth with a lot of locked doors \u2013 every time you find an unlocked door, it just leads to another locked door! How do we get out of this frustrating loop? Coding shortcuts!
A lot of coders will tell you that in order to be a successful coder, you need to know everything about coding and all its ins and outs. However, there is a reason why even experienced programmers take note of coding shortcuts. These little tricks make life easier for anyone who is just getting started with coding and doesn\u2019t have time to invest in learning every last bit of it before they can start creating useful programs.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...n}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...n,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Software engineering is a broad and fast-growing field. The market for software engineers continues to grow at a rapid pace, with demand expected to increase by another 280,000 jobs by 2022. Prospective software engineers therefore have many options when it comes to pursuing their career. Computer science programs generally provide an excellent foundation for those interested in pursuing software engineering as a specific career path, but these programs alone often aren\u2019t enough.
Programs specifically tailored toward software engineering can help you gain the skills and training you need to succeed in this field. There are many different types of software engineer positions available today, from front end development to data mining and artificial intelligence (AI). These are some of the top software engineering programs available.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The Best Coding Languages to Learn

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...o}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...o,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Having the skills to code can be an extremely useful asset in your professional and personal life. There is a huge demand for coders right now, and it is only going to continue growing in the future. Some of the most successful people today got there because they mastered a coding language and used it to their advantage. Whether you are looking for a new career opportunity or something you can use on a personal level, learning to code is something that will not only expand your mind but also open up so many doors for you.
Coding languages might seem intimidating at first glance, but once you get past the initial weirdness of reading something that seems like a foreign language, they are actually fairly straightforward. Even if you have no programming experience whatsoever, this article will give you all the information you need to begin your coder journey and find the perfect coding language for your needs.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Working with files is something that entry-level programmers don\u2019t get to do very often. It\u2019s not the most exciting part of software development, but it\u2019s an important one. The file system is the cornerstone of almost every program you use on your computer. Working with files in Java can seem a little counterintuitive at first. Once you understand what makes it different from other programming languages, it becomes much clearer.
Working with files in Java involves creating, reading, updating and deleting files. Files are stored as strings or bytes. If you have used other programming languages before, this will be familiar to you. In Java, there are two separate ways of working with files: standard streams and the new "File" class introduced in version 1.1 of the language. This article explains how to work with files using both methods and also touches on some related topics such New>.../New> tags and Jar archives (self-executable packages).`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: Python - The Language for Web Scraping

intro.compiledSource: const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,"Web scraping is the practice of extracting data from websites. In this blog, we\u2019ll discuss why you should learn Python for web scraping, as well as provide examples, resources and suggestions for getting started. The world wide web has made it easier than ever to share information with one another. However, that same ease of access has also made it harder than ever to separate useful information from noise. Because of this, many developers have turned to web scraping in order to extract the information they need from websites without having to manually search or filter through everything individually. Luckily for you, Python is a perfect language for getting started with web scraping! This blog will cover why you should learn Python for web scraping and offer useful resources to get started learning it."))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;
